header.subText: Helping New York find and keep rent stablized apartments

indexPage.title: What is Lease on the Block?
indexPage.pOne: Lease on the Block is a governance product designed to preserve affordable housing apartments in New York City.
indexPage.pTwo: We use innovative technology to create collaboration between Tenants, Affordable Housing Agencies and the Real Estate industry.
indexPage.pThree: Under the hood we use a decentralized private ledger that offers a one stop shop for saving, tracking and storing information about rent-stabilized apartments.

platformPage.title: Platform
platformPage.pOne: The Lease on the Block platform is a containerized private Ethereum network for lease processing and storage.
platformPage.pTwo: Role tokens establish idenity, smart contracts create, store, and modify lease and property documents.
platformPage.pThree: Our NYC demo was awarded 1st place in the Sustianable Cities Catagory of the 2020 BSIC Hackathon.
